description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=2/3. In Soul your goal is to bring the soul of a dead man to heaven throughout mazes that are going to test your dexterity and composure. Are you good enough to avoid ending up in hell ?
